import React from "react"; // reactstrap components import { Button, Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; function SectionIntroduction() { return ( <>

Welcome to GhostWithToast

Discover the thrilling world of GhostWithToast, where gaming meets blockchain technology. Dive into our roadmap to see how we’re enhancing the gaming experience with innovative features and community-driven developments.


Explore the Roadmap

🌟 Phase 1: Community Building and Initial Marketing

Build a strong community foundation and create buzz around the project.

👥 Phase 2: Token Development and Strategic Partnerships

Develop the tokenomics and establish key partnerships.

🔍 Phase 3: Prototype Development and Feedback

Begin development on simplified game prototypes and gather user feedback.

📢 Phase 4: Expanded Marketing and Community Events

Ramp up marketing efforts and host community events.

🚀 Phase 5: Full Game Development and Beta Testing

Develop full versions of selected games and conduct extensive beta testing.

🎮 Phase 6: Official Launch and Scaling

Launch the games publicly and scale the platform.

💎 Phase 7: Sustainability and Expansion

Ensure long-term engagement and expand the platform’s features.

Join Our Community

Stay updated with the latest news and participate in community decisions. Join us on our social platforms.

); } export default SectionIntroduction;
